summary: PREMATURE REAR SPRING BROKE.  CAR IS 65K MILES.  REAR SPRING RUSTED AND BROKE; CAUSES THE ENTIRE REAR SUSPENSION TO BREAK.  THIS MAKE THE CAR TILTED AND ALMOST OUT OF CONTROL.  I WAS ON A LOCAL ROAD TRAVELING AT 25 MPH GOING STRAIGHT.  I BROUGHT THE CAR TO STAR SUBARU SERVICE AND WAS BEING CHARGED $890.00 TO REPLACE REAR DRIVER SIDE SUSPENSION.  UPON INSPECTION, THE REAR PASSENGER SIDE SPRING ALSO RUSTED.
